name: Just A Minute (Skalex05)
description:
This game is based on my Ludum Dare 45 Entry

- Start With Nothing, you don't have any idea what's going on so you must go around and talk to the most time-wasting, weird and wacky people so that you can work out what's going on and save the world.

Oh and did I mention that you have to do all of this in just a single minute?
